name: Performance I
description: Building upon the work of DRM200Y1, students concentrate on scene study, styles of acting, and the development of ensemble work with an intensive focus on voice and movement practices. The Application Deadline is March 10th.
department: Centre for Drama, Theatre and Performance Studies
prerequisites: DRM100Y1/DRM101Y1/UNI102Y1; DRM200Y1; Minimum CGPA of 2.7 and permission of the Drama Centre. See online application for more details.

instructors: K Lynch C Block S Boye
K Lynch C Block S Boye
